name: Crossroads (Christian Oliveros, edanfersi, PerpetuumMobile)
description:
You wake up without your body and without memories in a strange place. Maybe if you explore you might be able to find something but be careful, you are feeling weirdly tired.

Maybe there might be more than one way to explore.

Made by:

  • Edward Fernandez
  • Christian Oliveros
  • Carlos Infante

With Unity and the Spinstee Font
